accessRights.description: Optional link(s) or a description of where the license associated to accessing this dataset
accessRights.title: Access Rights

accessService.example: The SAIL Databank is powered by the UK Secure e-Research Platform (UKSeRP). Following approval through safeguard processes, access to project-specific data within the secure environment is permitted using two-factor authentication.
accessService.title: Access Service

accessRequestCost.example: Data provision is free from SAIL. Overall project costing depends on the number of people that require access to the SAIL Gateway, the activities that SAIL needs to complete (e.g. loading non-standard datasets), data refreshes, analytical work required, disclosure control process, and special case technological requirements.
accessRequestCost.title: Organisation Access Request Cost

deliveryLeadTime.description: An arbitrary guess at the time to gain access to the dataset...
deliveryLeadTime.title: Access Request Duration

jurisdiction.description: Comma separated country codes of where the data jurisdiction is.
jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction

usage.description: This section includes information about how the data can be used and how it is currently being used
usage.title: Usage

access.description: This section includes information about data access

formatAndStandards.description: Section includes technical attributes for language vocabularies, sizes etc. and gives researchers facts about and processing the underlying data in the dataset.
formatAndStandards.title: Format and Standards

spatial.description: List of countries where the data was taken from
spatial.title: Spatial

physicalSampleAvailability.description: A list of what the dataset actually contains in terms of sample measurements
physicalSampleAvailability.title: Physical Sample Availability

pathway.description: Long description of the clinical/diagnostic/treatment pathway if applicable. This could include if the dataset is from a single speciality or area, a single tier of care, linked across two tier (e.g. primary and secondary care), or an integrated care record covering the whole patient pathway.
pathway.example:
The lookup contains references to link data held elsewhere on:
• individuals appearing as defendants in criminal cases dealt with by the magistrates' or Crown Court in England and Wales (including Youth Courts). 
• individuals supervised by the probation service in England and Wales
• individuals serving custodial sentences in England & Wales who appear within records from the prison data source, p-NOMIS. Young Offenders are included if resident at prisons or Young Offender Institutes (YOIs) that use p-NOMIS, however, this excludes the majority of Secure Schools and Secure Training Centres. "

"The linking dataset includes a person ID and link to record in other data first datasets for: 
• Disposals in the magistrates’ court from 1 January 2011 to 31 December 2020
• Disposals in the Crown Court from 1 January 2013 to 31 December 2020
• Custodial sentences of offenders in custody from January 2011 to September 2021 (including sentences begun before 2011) 
• Offender probation records from January 2014 to December 2020.
pathway.title: Pathway

followup.description: What is the typical time span that a patient appears in the dataset (follow up period)
followup.title: Followup

typicalAgeRange.description: Age range in whole years of participants in the dataset. Please provide range in the following format '[min age] – [max age]' where both the minimum and maximum are whole numbers (integers).
typicalAgeRange.title: Typical Age Range

lifestyle.description: Description of cohort lifestyle habits: Smoking, Physical activity, Dietary habits, Alcohol
lifestyle.title: Lifestyle

name.description: The name of a column in a table.
name.title: Column Name

dataType.description: The data type of values in the column
dataType.title: Data Type

description.description: A description of a column in a table.
description.title: Column Description

sensitive.description: A True or False value, indicating if the field is sensitive or not
sensitive.title: Sensitive

values.description: Data values contained within the column
values.title: Values

name.description: The name of a table in a dataset.
name.title: Table Name

description.description: A description of a table in a dataset.
description.title: Table Description

columns.description: A list of columns contained within a table in a dataset.
columns.title: Data Columns

description.description: A description of a unique value in a column.
description.title: Value Description

frequency.description: The frequency of occurrance of a value in a column
frequency.title: Value Frequency

isDerivedFrom.description: Indicate if derived datasets or predefined extracts are available and the type of derivation available. Notes. Single or multiple dimensions can be provided as a derived extract alongside the dataset
isDerivedFrom.example: Data will be minimised as appropriate relative to the data access application
isDerivedFrom.title: Derivations

isPartOf.description: If the dataset is part of a group or family
isPartOf.example: UKCRC Tissue Directory and Coordination Centre
isPartOf.title: Is PartOf

isMemberOf.description: Dataset is a member of XXX(?)
isMemberOf.title: Is MemberOf

linkedDatasets.example: Yes. To any SAIL dataset & reference data.,ALL
linkedDatasets.title: Linked Datasets

vocabularyEncodingSchemes.description: Code value of the ontology vocabulary encoding
vocabularyEncodingSchemes.title: Controlled Vocabulary

languages.description: Language code(s) of the language of the dataset metadata and underlying data is made available.
languages.title: Language Code(s)

formats.description: Format(s) the dataset can be made available in
formats.title: Dataset Format

associatedMedia.description: Any media associated with the Gateway Organisation using a valid URI for the content. This is an opportunity to provide additional context that could be useful for researchers wanting to understand more about the dataset and its relevance to their research question
associatedMedia.title: Associated Media

isReferenceIn.description: Rhe keystone paper associated with the dataset. Also include a list of known citations, if available and should be links to existing resources where the dataset has been used or referenced.
isReferenceIn.title: Is Reference in

tools.description: URL of any analysis tools or models that have been created for this dataset and are available for further use
tools.title: Tools

investigations.description: Please provide the keystone paper associated with the dataset.
investigations.title: Investigations

observedNode.description: Please select one of the following statistical populations for you observation
observedNode.title: Statistical Population

measuredValue.description: Please provide the population size associated with the population type the dataset i.e. 1000 people in a study, or 87 images (MRI) of Knee Usage Note: Used with Statistical Population, which specifies the type of the population in the dataset.
measuredValue.title: Measured Value

disambiguatingDescription.description: If SNOMED CT term does not provide sufficient detail, please provide a description that disambiguates the population type.
disambiguatingDescription.title: Disambiguating Description

observationDate.description: Please provide the date that the observation was made. Some datasets may be continuously updated and the number of records will change regularly, so the observation date provides users with the date that the analysis or query was run to generate the particular observation. Multiple observations can be made i.e. an observation of cumulative COVID positive cases by specimen on the 1/1/2021 could be 2M. On the 8/1/2021 a new observation could be 2.1M. Users can add multiple observations.
observationDate.title: Observation Date

measuredProperty.description: Initially this will be defaulted to "COUNT"
measuredProperty.title: Measured Property

purpose.description: Indicates the purpose(s) that the dataset was collected.
purpose.title: Purpose

source.description: Indicates the source of the data extraction
source.title: Source

collectionSituation.description: Indicate the setting(s) where data was collected. Multiple settings may be provided
collectionSituation.title: Setting

publisherName.description: The organisation responsible for running or supporting the data access request process, as well as publishing and maintaining the metadata. In most this will be the same as the HDR UK Organisation (Hub or Alliance Member)/
publisherName.title: Publisher name

publisherGatewayId.description: The link to an ID somewhere in the gateway where more information on the publisher can be retrieved.
publisherGatewayId.title: Publisher gateway id

gatewayId.description: Need a field in Mauro that captures the datasetID to link to gateway database - or can we just use the one created in Mauro?
gatewayId.title: Gatewayid

gatewayPid.description: Need a field in Mauro that captures the dataset pid to link to gateway database
gatewayPid.title: Gatewaypid

issued.description: Aren't issued and modified always the same because of versioning? Is that fine to duplicate because datasets in dcat might look different?
issued.title: Issued

modified.description: Aren't issued and modified always the same because of versioning? Is that fine to duplicate because datasets in dcat might look different?
modified.title: Modified

version.description: Version number used for previous version of this dataset
version.title: revision version

url.description: Some url with a reference to the record of a previous version of this dataset
url.title: revision url

title.description: The main title of the dataset
title.example: Publications that mention HDR-UK (or any variant thereof) in Acknowledgements or Author Affiliations
title.title: Title

shortTitle.description: A shorter descriptive title of the dataset
shortTitle.title: Shorttitle

abstract.example: COVID-19 Key Worker Testing Results data is required by NHS Digital to support COVID-19 requests for linkage, analysis and dissemination to other organisations who require the data in a timely manner.
abstract.title: Abstract

keywords.description: Comma separated key words associated to this dataset.
keywords.title: Keywords

controlledKeywords.description: Keywords that have been filtered and limited
controlledKeywords.title: Controlled Keywords

contactPoint.description: email of a person who can be the main contact point of this dataset
contactPoint.title: Contact Point

datasetType.description: What type of dataset is this?
datasetType.title: Dataset type

description.description: Longer description of the dataset in detail
description.example:
Publications that mention HDR-UK (or any variant thereof) in Acknowledgements or Author Affiliations

This will include:
- Papers
- COVID-19 Papers
- COVID-19 Preprint
description.title: Description

publisher.description: Link to details about the publisher of this dataset
publisher.title: Publisher

startDate.description: The start of the time period that the dataset provides coverage for
startDate.title: Start Date

endDate.description: The end of the time period that the dataset provides coverage for
endDate.title: End Date

timeLag.description: Rypical time-lag between an event and the data for that event appearing in the dataset
timeLag.title: Time Lag

accrualPeriodicity.description: frequency of distribution release. If a dataset is distributed regularly please choose a distribution release periodicity from the constrained list and indicate the next release date. When the release date becomes historical, a new release date will be calculated based on the publishing periodicity.

distributionReleaseDate.description: Date of the latest release of the dataset. If this is a regular release i.e. quarterly, or this is a static dataset please complete this alongside Periodicity.
distributionReleaseDate.title: Release Date

dataUseRequirement.description: Any requirements needed for data usage
dataUseRequirement.example: PROJECT SPECIFIC RESTRICTIONS,TIME LIMIT ON USE,USER SPECIFIC RESTRICTION
dataUseRequirement.title: Data Use Requirements

required.description: required metadata needed for the GWDM

summary.description: Summary of metadata describing key pieces of information.

structuralMetadata.description: Descriptions of all tables and data elements that can be included in the dataset
structuralMetadata.title: Structural Metadata
